signals.reason: RSI likely >70 (overbought), MACD histogram turning negative, price touching/above upper Bollinger Band and showing a pull‑back, EMA9 just crossed below EMA21, Stochastic in overbought zone and trending down, recent 00:48 candle is bearish after a strong 00:47 rally – all indicating short‑term downside pressure.
